title: anonrdp
author: anonrdp
content: AnonRDPIntroduction:AnonRDP provides cutting-edge anonymous hosting solutions at affordable prices, prioritizing your online privacy. Host your websites, applications, and data with complete anonymity. We accept only cryptocurrencies for payments, ensuring a seamless, private experience.Features:Acceptance of all types of content on servers and domainsCryptocurrency payments for enhanced privacyServers located in Europe, offering both Windows and Linux platformsDomain reselling through EranetPackages:Stealth - 13.99€/mo2 Cores6 GB DDR4 RAM40 GB SSD NVMeUnlimited bandwith1Gbps1 IP Extra: 2.50€/IPv4Cipher - 21.99€/mo4 Cores8 GB DDR4 RAM40 GB SSD NVMeUnlimited bandwith1Gbps1 IP Extra: 2.50€/IPv4Cryptic - 34.99€/mo6 Cores12 GB DDR4 RAM90 GB SSD NVMeUnlimited bandwith1Gbps1 IP Extra: 2.50€/IPv4Enigma - 46.99€/mo12 Cores24 GB DDR4 RAM150 GB SSD NVMeUnlimited bandwith1Gbps1 IP Extra: 2.50€/IPv4Ghost - 87.99€/mo24 Cores64 GB DDR4 RAM200 GB SSD NVMeUnlimited bandwith1Gbps1 IP Extra: 2.50€/IPv4Support:Email: support@anonrdp.comuTox: ECE9B1708747BBE9BEA03029DF16A7B662097D0EEDDD3A5A8A54CC7837251F118FE84A66F408Session: 0547533e9c9f551973ecb0c8910abbc629e4e80e060bb6200e9d853228dd554f5dClient area: https://clientarea.anonrdp.com/contact.phphttps://anonrdp.com

comments.author: anonrdp
comments.body: We have detected that there have been problems in the configuration of the Linux servers, due to an error in the configuration Windows was being installed automatically, we have fixed the problem and we have added an option for you to choose the operating system, we are sorry for the inconvenience!In short, we have fixed a problem with the operating system of the servers and now you can select which operating system to use!We continue to do things securely and anonymously.

comments.author: anonrdp
comments.body: Due to the incredible support we are receiving from our customers we have run out of stock! And in order not to saturate the servers we have expanded the servers in the datacenter.Orders will be processed approximately on the 10th of November at 22:00 UTC +1.Any orders placed after 13:00 UTC +1 on the 9th of November will be affected by the stock problem so the expiry date will be later, we will extend the subscription to those affected!In short, if you have placed an order after 13:00 UTC +1 on the 9th of November your server will be activated around 22:00 UTC +1 on the 10th of November.

comments.author: anonrdp
comments.body: We have good news!We have stock again, we are processing all orders placed, if your order has not been processed please open a ticket to resolve it manually.Additionally we have added a tool to check if the IP of the server is blackhole, you can check it through the following link: https://anonrdp.com/blackholeIn short, the stock is back and we have added a tool to check if the server IP is blackhole.Thank you very much and sorry for the inconvenience!

comments.author: anonrdp
comments.body: We are still online and taking orders!
